column5: hey folks, im lookin to get out salmon fishing tomorrow morning at 4:00am! any advice for preferable tackle for salmon in the st. mary's river would be great.(i got the cleo thing down, just lookin for somethin new?) if anyone can answer this question, thanks in advance: does a roe, hook, and slip sinker set up produce, or.....? i've been wanting to try it for a while.  JP
big rattle baits (Raps, spots) Canadian wigglers  Last couple of years I've like the Williams Bully spoons with glow tape
flat black north port nailer with gold tape in the AM.
If you bought all the tackle on the list, Orest would be sold out

well..... them salmon certainly didnt want spoons of any kind today, a guy caught 2 salmon on a buzz bomb, and the other guys were bouncing around roe and thats deffinately what they wanted today.... but i did get into a school of mixed salmon (mostly pinks) which had a king roaming around with them, but i casted out the ol' cleos and had some followers but no hits....   JP
